subject: Javadocing test case and other test classes?
msgSnippet: Hi - when you last wrote a library (say of a few 100 classes) and delivered it to customers (internal, external), and you decided (what I always do) that you
messageBody:
Hi -

when you last wrote a library (say of a few 100 classes) and delivered
it to customers (internal, external), and you decided (what I always do)
that you delivered it including all test cases and test classes (i.e.
the complete test suite), did you then
a) include Javadoc for the testsuite classes
b) deliver a separate Javadoc for the testsuite classes
c) not deliver any Javadoc for the testsuite classes
?

Thx
Harald M. Mueller

P.S. I'm sorry if the question has been asked and answered before - but
I'm unable to search all of the archives on yahoo - apparently, only the
last3..6 months or so are searched under "Search Archive". How do I
search everything?


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
